--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill looked down at the ground, and kicked a bit of dust over 
in
> contemplation, he then looked at Beachcomber, who nodded in return. 
He
> looked up at the sky, "Well, it was less than a vorn ago....." 
Firedrill
> said.
> 

::REDHOT::

    Redhot was quiet as Firedrill spoke. He found a spot where he 
could sit comfortably and listen to the tale uninterrrupted. He 
honestly wished he could remeber his own creation day...

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
